article:
Things are always changing like the clock, the weather, and even me. Nothing can always stay the same . My life is full of changes. Sometimes I don't feel good about  _ , but later things become better.
My pet cat, Taffy, runs away. We look for her all over the house but we cannot _  her. I miss her a lot and I am _ . Dad tells me that we can get another one. That _ me happy again, but I will  _ remember Taffy.
My best friend, Robin, just moves  _ . The moving van  takes away _ and the house is empty . Maybe I can not  _ her any more. Robin now lives at the foot of the hills far away from here. Mum says we can take  a train there and play with Robin again.
The day I start the new school year, I am afraid of all my  _ classmates in my class. I am afraid they _  like me. Now I am happy because I have lots of new friends. I  _ my class and my teacher.
Isn't that wonderful? Yesterday I looked in the mirror. My face looked like a Halloween pumpkin _  I lost my first tooth. I had a big surprise _  I woke up this morning.
